Towering Presence.name: Towering Presence
Towering Presence.fullText:
Half-Giant Thug Attack 11Towering Presence

You slam a foe to the ground and stand astride it, preventing the enemy from rising until it has dealt with you.

Encounter        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee 1

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Until the end of its next turn, the target can’t stand up until either it attacks you or you are not adjacent to it.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 31.
Towering Presence.flavor: You slam a foe to the ground and stand astride it, preventing the enemy from rising until it has dealt with you.
Towering Presence.attack: Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Dexterity vs. AC
Towering Presence.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Until the end of its next turn, the target can’t stand up until either it attacks you or you are not adjacent to it.

Rockslide Stance.name: Rockslide Stance
Rockslide Stance.fullText:
Half-Giant Thug Attack 20Rockslide Stance

You use techniques you learned through a lifetime of brawls to become tougher and meaner than anyone else around.

Daily        Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the rockslide stance. Until the stance ends, you gain resistance equal to your Strength or Constitution modifier to all damage. Once per round when you hit with a melee weapon or close weapon attack on your turn, each enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength modifier, plus 1[W] extra damage if you have combat advantage against that enemy.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 31.
Rockslide Stance.flavor: You use techniques you learned through a lifetime of brawls to become tougher and meaner than anyone else around.
Rockslide Stance.effect: You assume the rockslide stance. Until the stance ends, you gain resistance equal to your Strength or Constitution modifier to all damage. Once per round when you hit with a melee weapon or close weapon attack on your turn, each enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength modifier, plus 1[W] extra damage if you have combat advantage against that enemy.

Sudden Endurance.name: Sudden Endurance
Sudden Endurance.fullText:
Half-Giant Thug Utility 12Sudden Endurance

Your enemy might be attacking you, but you barely notice.

Encounter  
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack

Effect: You gain resist 10 to all damage against that attack.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 31.
Sudden Endurance.flavor: Your enemy might be attacking you, but you barely notice.
